rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment uses neutral language and factual reporting without high-potency verbs or metaphors.
The segment does not contain a moderate verb paired with explicit scale or impact information.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
The segment reports facts (location of cases) but contains no explicit calming cue.
The segment does not contain a minimiser used with a scale contrast.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
The segment describes location of cases, not capability or preparedness.
The segment reports locations of cases, not prices or metrics.
The segment reports recent case locations, not speculation about future relief.
No direct quote or clearly attributed statement providing a dominant frame.
Factual report of location and type of cases. No explicit framing cues remain.
